title: Ore Wa Koisuru Onnanoko
description:
Description :
        Yuuri Onagawa is a young boy about to enter high school, who constantly pines over his childhood friend Kyouko. One day he meets her after years of separation, only to find out that she despises men now. Upset, he prays at a shrine to have them become friends once again. The god fulfills his wish, but in a way he never expected…
